attributes.action: Make it a priority to give all disabled people a better standard of living.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many disabled people find daily life a great struggle, especially through fuel poverty, buildings which still remain very difficult for them to enter, and a very restricted life through shortage of money. Benefits are meagre and an insult to a proud section of our community. Britain as one of the richest nations in the world could do so much more.
